## TocEventItemDetails.p property

The paragraph element inserted by the `toc` action unless the `anchored` option from [TocParameters](./toc.tocparameters.md) is either `false` or nonpositive

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
p?: HTMLParagraphElement;
```
